testcase.title: WOSCC: Organization Enhanced search : Always retrieves 0 results every time when users select a variant from the Details page for any organization

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"

substeps.message: First selected option for dropDown Search Fields (row 1) is defined.
dropDown Search Fields (row 1)  Organization-Enhanced option is selected.

steps.title: I select 'Search aid' for field "Organization-Enhanced" on page "Basic Search"
I click on "View Details" against the "A-Technology"
I click on "Add" button for the "A TEKNOLOJI"
I click on button "OK" in the "Search Aid" page
I click on button "Search" in the "Basic Search" page
I verify the "Results Summary" page is displayed
